nodes.text: The  optimal solution was to cut back the numbers of Tygodnik Mazowsze we printed at the  center while at the same time producing stencils that local union groups could use to  make their own copies of the journal.
The head of the distribution  network who had contacts with the majority of drop-off points was arrested just a few  months into the  war.
A group arrest of distributors is always a big  blow since rebuilding such a network requires long and tedious work.
If you put something in someone s  hands they d still pass it along but people stopped coming to us on their own
Our problems however are not so much with printing the material as with distributing it.
If we cut back the number of papers printed at the center and we produce stencils we cut the number of distributors
The goal is to reduce the number of distributors
Every so often a large group of distributors gets caught.
If distributors are caught the distribution has problems
Moreover while at  the beginning of martial law we literally had crowds of people clamouring to be  distributors over time this began to come to a halt.
If the distributors decrease in number the distribution has problems
